Day 1 (Mon) - Strength (Full Body A):
30 minute easy run @ RPE 4 (conversational pace. 
 10 min Cool down with dynamic movements and stretches
Day 2 (Tue) - Varied Quality Run: Run: 30-40 min Easy (RPE 4-5) with 4-6x20s "fun" sprints/pick-ups, full jog recovery.
Day 3 (Wed) - Metcon/WOD (Engine/Skill):
Metcon (AMRAP 12 min): 
 5 Cal Row/Ski/Bike 
 7 KB Swings (Light-Mod) 
 9 Air Squats. 
 Focus: Smooth movement, not max intensity.
Day 4 (Thu) - Active Recovery / Mobility: 20-30 min Walk, Yoga, Full Body Foam Roll.
Day 5 (Fri) - Strength (Full Body B + Hy:
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. RDLs (DBs or BB): 3x10-12 (RPE 6-7) 
 B. DB Overhead Press: 3x10-12 
 C. Walking Lunges: 2x10/leg 
 D. Farmer's Carry (Light, focus on posture): 2x30m. 
 Cool-down: Static.
Day 6 (Sat) - Longer Run / Hybrid WOD: Run: 45-60 min Easy (RPE 4-5) on a new/enjoyable route. OR Light Hybrid: 2 Rds: 400m Run, 10 Burpees, 15 Sit-ups.
Day 7 (Sun) - Rest: Rest. Focus on enjoyment of movement.

Day 1 (Mon) - Strength (Full Body A):
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. Back Squats (Light-Mod): 3x8-10 (RPE 7) 
 B. DB Incline Press: 3x10-12 
 C. Step-Ups: 3x10/leg 
 D. Core. 
 Cool-down: Static.
Day 2 (Tue) - Varied Quality Run:
Warm-up: 5 min dynamic 
 Workout: 
 1. Kettlebell swings (moderate KB): 3 x 8-10 reps 
 2. DB rows: 3 x 15 each side 
 3. Walking Lunges: 3 x 6-8 reps/leg 
 4. Plank: 3 x 30-40 sec hold 
 Cool-down: 5 min static stretch
Day 3 (Wed) - Metcon/WOD (Engine/Skill):
Metcon (For Time - 10 min cap): 
 21-15-9 
 DB Thrusters (Light) 
 Pull-ups (or Ring Rows) 
 After each round: 100m Sprint/Fast Shuttle.
Day 5 (Fri) - Strength (Full Body B + Hy:
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. Deadlifts (Trap Bar or Conventional, Light-Mod): 3x6-8 (RPE 7) 
 B. Push Press (DB or BB): 3x8-10 
 C. Sled Push Drills (Empty or very light, focus on technique): 3x25m. 
 D. Wall Ball Skill (Light, form): 2x10. 
 Cool-down: Static.
Day 6 (Sat) - Longer Run / Hybrid WOD: Run: 50-65 min Easy (RPE 4-5). OR Hybrid: Run 800m, then 3 Rds: 10 Goblet Squats, 10 Push-ups, 10 Box Jumps/Step-ups, then Run 800m.

Day 1 (Mon) - Strength (Full Body A):
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. Front Squats: 3x6-8 (RPE 7-8) 
 B. Weighted Push-ups / Dips: 3xAMRAP-1 
 C. Bulgarian Split Squats: 3x8-10/leg 
 D. Hanging Knee Raises. 
 Cool-down: Static.
Day 2 (Tue) - Varied Quality Run: Run: 40-50 min with Hill Sprints: WU, then 6-8 x 20-30s max effort hill sprint, walk/jog down recovery. CD.
Day 3 (Wed) - Metcon/WOD (Engine/Skill):
Metcon (EMOM 16 min): 
 Min 1: 8-12 Cal Row/Ski 
 Min 2: 8-12 Burpees 
 Min 3: 10-15 Wall Balls (Mod) 
 Min 4: Rest.
Day 5 (Fri) - Strength (Full Body B + Hy:
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. RDLs (Heavier): 3x8-10 (RPE 7-8) 
 B. Strict Press (BB): 3x6-8 
 C. Farmer's Carry (Moderate-Heavy): 3x40m 
 D. Sled Pull Drags (Moderate): 3x25m.

Day 6 (Sat) - Longer Run / Hybrid WOD: Run: 60-75 min Easy (RPE 4-5). OR Hybrid "Chipper" Lite: For Time: 400m Run, 30 Air Squats, 20 Sit-ups, 10 Pull-ups, 400m Run, 30 Lunges, 20 Push-ups, 10 KB Swings, 400m Run.

Day 1 (Mon) - Strength (Full Body A):
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. Back Squats: Build to a challenging 5RM for the day, then 2x5 @ 85% of that. 
 B. DB Bench Press (Heavy): 3x6-8 
 C. Glute Ham Raises / Hip Thrusts: 3x10-12. 
 D. Core. 
 Cool-down: Static.
Day 2 (Tue) - Varied Quality Run:
Warm-up: 5 min dynamic 
 Workout: 
 1. Kettlebell swings (moderate KB): 3 x 16 reps 
 2. Bar Bell upright row: 3 x 8 
 3. Walking Lunges with 10kg plate: 3 x 6-8 reps/leg 
 4. Plank: 3 x 30-40 sec hold 
 Cool-down: 5 min static stretch
Day 3 (Wed) - Metcon/WOD (Engine/Skill): (Run): 10 min easy jog WU. Then 4 x (200m run @ RPE 6-7/10 / 200m walk/jog recovery). 5 min CD.
Day 4 (Thu) - Active Recovery / Mobility:
Warm-up: 5 min dynamic 
 Workout: 
 1. Bar bell deadlift: 3 x 12-15 reps 
 2. DB Overhead Press (light): 3 x 8-10 reps 
 3. Farmer's Carry: 3 x 50-60 sec walk or 2x 25-30m for distance. 
 4. DB Rows (progress weight or reps): 3 x 10-12 reps/arm 
 Cool-down: 5 min static stretch
Day 5 (Fri) - Strength (Full Body B + Hy:
Skill Focus (15-20 min): 
 1. Wall Balls: 3x8 with light med ball, focus on unbroken reps & breathing. 
 2. Sled Push: 3x15m with vcomfotable weight, focus on leg drive. 
 Light Compromised Run Intro: 2 Rounds: 
 8 Wall Balls (light) 
 15m Sled Push (light) 
 200m easy run 
 2 min Rest
Day 6 (Sat) - Longer Run / Hybrid WOD: Run: 70-80 min Easy (RPE 4-5). OR Hybrid Intervals: 3 Rds: Run 800m (RPE 7-8), Rest 2 min, then 2 min AMRAP (e.g., DB Snatches + Box Jumps). Rest 2 min.

Day 1 (Mon) - Strength (Full Body A):
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. Overhead Squats (PVC/Light Bar for mobility, or Front Squats 3x5 RPE 8)

 Cool-down: Static.
Day 2 (Tue) - Varied Quality Run: Run: 40-50 min Progressive Run: Start easy, finish last 10-15 min @ Tempo effort (RPE 7-8).
Day 3 (Wed) - Metcon/WOD (Engine/Skill):
Metcon (Hyrox Simulation Lite - Stations 1-3): 
 Run 800m 
 SkiErg 500-750m (Mod effort) 
 Run 800m 
 Sled Push 25-50m (Mod weight) 
 Run 800m 
 Sled Pull 25-50m (Mod weight) 
 Run 800m. Focus on flow.
Day 5 (Fri) - Strength (Full Body B + Hy:
Hyrox Combo Focus: 3 Rounds: 
 10 Wall Balls (light-mod) 
 20m Sled Push (light-mod) 
 400m light run
 90s-2min Rest 
 Focus: Smooth transitions.
 Finish with 1000m row
Day 6 (Sat) - Longer Run / Hybrid WOD: Run: 75-90 min Easy (RPE 4-5). Longest run this cycle. OR "Partner" WOD (done solo if needed): E.g., YGIYGO style on 2-3 movements for 15-20 min.

Day 1 (Mon) - Strength (Full Body A):
Warm-up: Dynamic. 
 A. Back Squat: 5x5 (RPE 8, challenging volume) 
 B. Weighted Dips / Close Grip Bench: 3xAMRAP / 8-10 (RPE 8-9)

 D. Advanced Core (e.g., Dragon Flags, GHD Sit-ups if experienced). 
 Cool-down: Static.
Day 2 (Tue) - Varied Quality Run:
Warm-up: 5 min dynamic 
 Workout (Strength Endurance Circuit - 2-3 Rounds): 
 1. Goblet Squats x15 
 2. Push-ups x AMRAP - max explosive 
 3. Walking Lunges with sandbag x10/leg 
 4. Wall ball sit-up
Day 3 (Wed) - Metcon/WOD (Engine/Skill):
Metcon (Classic CrossFit Benchmark - Scaled if needed): 
 E.g., "Fran" (21-15-9 Thrusters & Pull-ups) or "Grace" (30 Clean & Jerks for time). 
 OR a challenging AMRAP like "Cindy" (20 min: 5 Pull-ups, 10 Push-ups, 15 Squats).
Day 4 (Thu) - Active Recovery / Mobility:
Warm-up: 5 min dynamic 
 Workout (Full Body Strength): 
 1.Front Squat : 3x8 
 2. DB Incline Press: 3x12-15 
 3. Single Arm DB Row: 3x10-12/arm 
 4. Sled Pull (if available, light) o Ring rows or Banded Pull-aparts 3x15-20

Day 5 (Fri) - Strength (Full Body B + Hy:
Hyrox Combo Focus: 3 Rounds: 
 250m Row (moderate) 
 10 Burpees (scaled as needed) 
 400m light jog 
 20m walking lunges
 90s-2min Rest 
 Focus: Managing heart rate.
Day 6 (Sat) - Longer Run / Hybrid WOD:
Hybrid "Race Sim Lite": 
 Run 1km. Then 3-4 "stations" with 400-800m run between (e.g. 50 Wall Balls, 50m Sled Push, 50 KB Swings, 50 Burpees). Mod intensity. 
 OR 60-75 min Easy Run.
